Package cz.opendata.tenderstats

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Geocoder.GeoProvider
    Provider of geocoding services.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractComponent
    Abstract servlet component to be used in cz.opendata.tenderstats project.
    ComponentConfiguration
    Holds component configuration needed for network communication with databases and other values.
    DemoComponent
    Demo component from "Ako na novu komponentu" tutorial in /tutorials/.
    Geocoder
    Thread-safe geocoding of addresses to geographic coordinates.
    Geocoder.GeoProviderFactory
    Factory for creating GeoProviders from online HTTP services with supported output formats.
    Mailer
    Sends mails using configured smtp server.
    Matchmaker
    Component which handles matching events and suppliers.
    PCFilingApp
    Component which handles reading and writing private and public events and associated actions.
    SystemManager
    Component which handles user sessions, login, registration.
    UserContext
    Holds user context information, such as username and user preferences.
    Calling set* methods currently affects only this instance and changed values are not written back to RDB.
    Utils
    Servlet implementing miscelaneous utilities, such as mail sending.
